20040000.text: You arrived safely. You worked hard. Now...

20040001.text: Ah~~~ Look, it hasn't even been a minute since you came back.

20040002.text: Isn't it just what you were supposed to do as a munju?

20040003.text:
Ah, okay, okay, I need to go say hello to Master. 
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>, you too.

20040004.text: Oh, before that, shouldn't you bring a present for the elder?

20040005.text: Gift? That would be nice. What does Master like?

20040006.text:
I know you'll love it. 
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hongdon</> problem solving... <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Black Dawn</> Repel or...

20040007.text: That's what the death penalty should care about!

20040008.text:
If it's for <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</>, then of course, Master Moon should also be concerned. 
The Elder Elder is also in trouble. Perfect for greetings. It will be a gift.

20040009.text:
Ugh... Okay. Let's do this quickly. 
Let's go <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>.

20040010.text: Isn't it Munju?! What's going on?

20040011.text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Biryuha</> sent by the death penalty. You want me to ask the captain?

20040012.text:
That's right. I'm in charge of the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hongdon tribe</> related issues. 
Lord Moon has come to solve it himself. Okay. Then explain the situation. I will.

20040013.text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Weeping</> The <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hongdon</> have been angry ever since the expedition broke their promise. However, they never attacked our clan, but they started attacking even our clan members from the passage for a while.

20040014.text:
They're usually a little angry, <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hongdon</> guys. 
It's strange that they even attack us though. So you know what? Do you have anything?

20040015.text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Weeping</> The relatively moderate <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hongdon</> are also violent. We lost, but 
Fortunately, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Donchil Hong</>, the leader of the moderates, escaped the group and asked us for help.

20040016.text:
If <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Donchil Hong</>, then he is the older brother of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Donpal Hong</>. That's surprising. 
 I thought it would be more violent than <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hongdonpal</>.

20040017.text:
So where is <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Donchil Hong</> now?
I think we should meet and talk about it.

20040018.text:
Two members of our team are protecting him.
You'll find him if you go there.

20040020.text: Honor name! Nice to meet you, Lord Moon.

20040021.text:
What's the name of John... You don't have to be so polite. 
I heard from the captain. Where is <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Donchil Hong</>?

20040024.text: Yes, nice to meet you. I am <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Arang</> of <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</>.

20040025.text:
Who is the person next to you~? 
If you don't think this conversation will be helpful, leave out~

20040026.text: Oh, my friend. I'll guarantee my skills.

20040027.text: No guarantees~ I believe only what I see~

20040031.text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Hongdonchil</> is also said to be strong)

20040032.text: Yeah. I thought only <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hong Don-pal</> was strong. Are they still brothers?

20040033.text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Empty</> is a lot stronger than me~ A few years ago <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Empty</> >'s minion found a strange stone around here. Since then, <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Fantastic</> and his subordinates have become more and more violent.

20040034.text:
Is it <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>'strange stone'</>... <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>fertile</>? No. <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Fertility</>I don't make this guy violent.
If that's the case, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Tartrate</>...

20040036.text: It's not exactly known, but I've heard of <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Takhoeam</>'s energy that causes you to lose your temper or change your appearance.

20040037.text: First we need to check if the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hongdon</> have the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Strange Stone</> ?

20040038.text: Come on, mix this medicine with some very tasty food and try to weaken and subdue <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>arms</>. <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>I'll show you where the little ones</> sometimes take a mud bath alone.

20040039.text:
I haven't tried this because I don't think I'll be able to win even with this drug. 
No worries, Moonju, and the human next to me looks like they can do it together~

20040040.text: Oh, thank you. Leave it to me!

20040041.text: What kind of food is this~?

20040044.text: Even if you're weak, you're still <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Chief of the Hongdon clan</>. It was a great strength.

20040046.text: What are you doing... ugh... By the way, where are you...

20040047.text:
Have you regained your senses? Tell me where is the stone that you got your hands on a few years ago. 
That stone is what caused you to get weird!

20040048.text: A stone...? Are you... talking about this...?

20040050.text: This is... joul... su... kuul- ku-wool

20040052.text:
Oh my... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Donchil Hong</> must have given him a large amount of sleeping pills.
After making a fuss, soon <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The Red Dons</> They're coming. Let's destroy the stones and leave!

20040053.text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Donchil Hong</> has sent it to you~! 
I'm here to give you another request~

20040054.text: A request? Ha, let's hear what it is.

20040055.text:
You asked me to release the captured moderates~ 
And you also asked me to get weapons for the moderates to use~

20040058.text: Okay, okay. Now that you're here, can I help you?

20040060.text: Thank you for doing a favor~ I heard you destroyed a stone~

20040061.text:
Yeah. I think it was due to <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Tericite</> so I destroyed it. 
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hongdon We'll have to wait and see if the violence of </> goes away, right?

20040062.text:
Once a mind becomes strange, it doesn't seem to come back easily~ 
My subordinates are still a bit strange...

20040063.text: It will take some time. What do you plan to do next?

20040064.text:
This is a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hong-don</> problem, so I will try to solve it as much as possible in the future~ 
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun </> will not be attacked as much as possible!

20040065.text: Nice to meet you. Thank you.

20040067.text: Honor name! Nice to meet you, Lord Moon.

20040068.text: Everyone keeps saying that you don't have to be too polite, really

20040070.text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Biryuha</> The death sentence told me. These days, <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Black Dawn</> They say I'm in trouble. How's the situation?

20040071.text:
They worship <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</>, close to fanaticism. 
Currently <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Animals On the hill of </>, we are fighting with our <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</> battle team.

20040072.text:
Worship <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</>... Chit. In the end, we can only be hostile. 
This problem should be rather simple. Isn't it? <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>.

20040073.text: Then let's talk more with our centurion at <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Hill of Annunciation</>.

20040074.text: Okay. Come on, let's go break it down!

20040075.text:
John!, Oops... Lord Moon is here. 
I got a call from the manager anyway. I'll explain the situation right away.

20040076.text: At the moment, at the entrance of the hill, the Tenjin is fighting. The current situation of the Tendon who broke through the entrance is unknown. And a small number of people are imprisoned deep in the hill.

20040077.text:
I think Moonju will break through the entrance again
and rescue the people imprisoned with the ten people inside.

20040078.text:
Um... In short, do you mean you can just sweep the entrance away? 
Okay! Then let's go!

20040081.text:
It's not a big deal. Are you saying these guys were this much stronger than that? 
You must have worked hard all this time. But is this enough to slow you down for a while?

20040083.text:
I don't know where they appear, but reinforcements from these guys will come soon. 
First, you've defeated the guy who seems to be the captain, so get out.

20040084.text:
Shit. Okay. I feel like sweeping it away, but everyone's in a bad state. 
Let's go straight to <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</>.

20040085.text: I'll go back with the clan members, so would you like to go first? <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>.

20040087.text: Thank you. Then let's get out of here.

20040088.text:
I think it's better to go down the cliff than to go back the way you came.
Hold on the wounded everyone! Let's go!

20040089.text: Okay! Lord Moon! Be careful everyone!

20040090.text: (Moves to the cliff while exhorting the members of the clan)

20040092.text: (He says he'll never join the cliff-jumping strategy again)

20040093.text: I agree too. Phew... Let's go back to <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</>.

20040094.text:
You are back. Munju-sama. I heard that you did a great job. 
The Chief Elder will like it very much.

20040095.text:
Don't make fun of me. The death penalty. It was close. 
It was too hasty to judge, so the members of the clan were in danger.

20040096.text:
Hey. Moonju has finished thinking about that! 
The reward of preparing a present this time will be doubled.

20040097.text: Uh huh... I'm just living the death penalty for fun.

20040098.text:
You are too! Let's go to Master. 
I prepared a present, so you won't be scolded.

20040099.text: You would have liked it even if you went empty-handed. Master.

20040100.text: Is that so? haha. Come on, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>.

20040101.text:
Do you think a writer who only shows up when he needs it and asks him to give <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>fertility</> 
would be worthy of being a monarch, father?

20040102.text: It is the will of the Lord Moon!

20040103.text:
Munju, Munju, Munju! 
Why is she the Munju? Not me!?

20040104.text: Originally, even before he was born, his father gave him the gate, but shouldn't he have passed on the position of the gatekeeper to his son?

20040105.text:
Munju is not inherited by blood! Why are you still not realizing that you need skills and qualifications! 
That's why you're saying you're lacking!

20040106.text:
Skills? Ha! That's funny. Good. 
I'll show you that skill.

20040107.text:
I'll bring you <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Fertility</> before that child, 
then you'll have to give me the seat of the moonshine!!

20040110.text:
Why don't you just look around for a while?
I'll just spend some time and come back.

20040112.text: Then take a look and see you later.

20040113.text: Welcome back, Master. The friend I was talking about is this guy.

20040114.text:
Oh, you are the alumni of our Master Moon. 
It's nice to meet you like this.

20040115.text: (Tell <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Songmunak</> to be polite and speak low)

20040116.text:
It can't be. 
I used to be a teacher, but now I'm not a full-fledged Master Moon and his colleague.

20040117.text:
You're being strict... you're still there anyway. 
That's why <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>The death penalty</> is so...

20040119.text: ... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>The city</> said they would bring back the giant <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Fertility</> I went to the old <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>fertile</> site.

20040120.text: But if only a single human went to that place, it would be burnt down?

20040121.text:
Please. I am an ugly child, but still my child. 
Think of the past and save Si Guk.

20040122.text:
You don't have to. 
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>The death penalty</> was a friend I grew up with as a child.

20040126.text: If it was <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>The death penalty</>, I ran towards the razor.

20040127.text: Rope? Why did you go to the ropeway...?

20040128.text: Well... I'm not sure about that.

20040131.text: I rode a ropeway to the Great Fertility.

20040132.text: Rope? But that would be too dangerous...

20040133.text: We told you that too, but you recklessly made it work.

20040134.text: Damn... I need to hurry before it's too late.

20040138.text: ... I'll go to the branch first.

20040141.text:
You know this is not true. 
The person who knelt down to save his son. It can't be okay.

20040143.text: No... I don't know how. But...

20040144.text: (Says what are you doing without going fast)

20040147.text: (someone said it seems like they dropped this after taking <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>quick execution</>)

20040148.text: But it's extremely rare that someone has <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>fertility</>...? .

20040150.text: Obviously! Master came back and saved the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>state death penalty</>. I don't have to worry, right?

20040151.text: (Something reluctant, but I agree that it could be)

20040152.text:
Okay. Then <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>fertility</>, things are going well... 
Should I finish what I was doing?

20040154.text:
Hey! Dalian! 
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Fertility</> You said you could open a rift by competing with <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Fertility</>.

20040156.text:
You know what. Why don't you just move to a suitable place instead of like this? 
If it's close to here... Yes, <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Crystal Jungle</> would be nice . See you there!

20040157.text: Oh, it's been a while since I've had a light craft showdown? Let's go!

20040158.text: I think this could be it!

20040161.text: Ouch... I really want to ask! Why are you disturbing me!?

20040162.text: You're so stupid you're mad at me! <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Regressor</> can't stop the rift, call it yourself!? How can you <textColor= [255:204:102:255]>Regression</> is not that foolish!

20040163.text: Don't be rude! You said this guy's dad said <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</>! Plus <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Noy You killed </>!

20040164.text: What does that have to do with this?

20040165.text: So I tried to call <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</> and ask! Do you know? <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</> Will he be summoned? If not, at least the same <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</>, you can ask about him.

20040166.text:
Ha.. I was stupid. 
If I inherited the blood of <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Noy</>, I'd be just a child...

20040167.text: I said this too hastily. It's my fault. Basically, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>God Beast</> should not get involved in human affairs, but you're not human, so it'll be fine. I won't help.

20040169.text: I will visit you when the time is right.

20040170.text:
Now, until <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pasa</> arrives, shall I go look for <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Fertility</>? But, 
What are you going to do?

20040172.text: Oh, I'll be looking forward to it. Take care then!

20040173.text: You're back! Master Moon. I told you...

20040174.text: Ahaha! Death penalty, that's how much we practice...

20040175.text:
I know. You two, you didn't neglect your training. 
Well~ If that's the case, the Elder will like it too.

20040178.text: (Let's use the ingredients Hong Donchil gave us)

20040179.text:
Whew. I also rescued the members of the clan who were caught on the way. 
We told you to gather around the Ten Commanders, so let's join.

20040183.text: I can feel the powerful energy around me!

20040185.text:
I can barely feel the aura of the death penalty...!?
Let's go this way!
